
= Serializing =

To serializa and deserialize OPSObjects to and from bytes to send on the network, OPS uses a serialize design inspired by boosts Serialize (http://boost.org). The idea is to have a tethod serialize that excepts a visitor as argument. In the serialize method, the object calls a method on the visitor with ech of its fields as inout/output parameters to that method.
